objects.text:
• Vibrant pepperoni pizza print design
• High-quality canvas with detailed artwork
• Cushioned insole for all-day comfort

EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT
LIMITED TIME OFFER!

product_details.name: Pizza Passion High-Top Sneakers - The Ultimate Food Lover's Footwear
product_details.description:
• Vibrant pepperoni pizza print design covering the entire shoe surface
• High-quality canvas upper material with detailed food artwork
• Classic high-top silhouette with comfortable ankle support
• Durable rubber sole with vintage-style cream colored finish
• Traditional lace-up closure with metal eyelets
• Realistic food graphics with rich colors and textures
• Cushioned insole for all-day comfort
• Perfect for pizza enthusiasts and food fashion lovers
• Unique conversation starter footwear
• Available in unisex sizing
• Easy-to-clean surface material
• Ideal for casual wear and special food-themed events

banner_details:
This banner design features a playful and bold aesthetic focused on promoting themed footwear. The background is split vertically with the left side occupying a bright orange rounded rectangle pattern and the right side in a soft beige tone. A vibrant sneaker with a pizza print ("product_image") dominates the right, paired with abstract red geometric details and circular yellow accent graphics, reinforcing the food theme. The title ("heading") uses a bold, fun font in all caps with color contrasts between white and yellow for emphasis. Supporting text layers include a tagline ("tagline"), subhead ("subheading"), feature list ("description"), price tag ("price") in a modern display type, and a bold yellow call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") at the bottom.

**Color Palette**:
- Soft Cream (#FFF5E9)
- Bright Red-Orange (#FF5733)
- Golden Yellow (#FFD700)
- Clean White (#FFFFFF)
- Deep Red (#A13300)
product_color: The product image features a high-top sneaker with a vibrant pizza graphic, creatively combining food imagery with fashion. The dominant colors include a rich pepperoni red (#BA3A26), warm baked crust tan (#F5BF82), and creamy mozzarella beige (#F2E2C4). Bright green (#3FA63F) from the herbs adds a pop of contrast, while the white laces and rubber sole (#F5F5F5) balance the palette with neutrality. Colors are skillfully blended to mimic a real pizza while being bold and eye-catching, ensuring the design remains playful yet attention-grabbing. This dynamic palette is ideal for a fun, youthful ad banner targeting trendy, food-loving audiences.
